text: Sunday Summit (el. ) is a highway summit along the Crowsnest Highway in British Columbia, Canada. It is the second-highest point on the highway between the cities of Hope and Princeton - the highest being Allison Pass, located to the west. It is located just east of the eastern boundary to Manning Park. ==References== Category:Similkameen Country Category:Mountain passes of British Columbia Category:Canadian Cascades
title: Sunday Summit
